story_arceus_04_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: You’re gonna train with me today too, right?
story_arceus_04_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: We just battled. Shouldn’t you take a break?
story_arceus_04_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: I need to do more for Arceus to accept me!
story_arceus_04_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Sometimes it’s important to train hard and
push yourself.
story_arceus_04_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
It seems you’ve lost sight of the true
meaning of it.
